entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 07:00 AM CDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: N 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
